data.title: Ben Murphy on LinkedIn: #benonnova #nova100 #kis101 #melbourneradio #australianradionetwork…
data.meta_description: as most of you know the last 12 months as I am unable to perform my magic show in China, I have been working on 2 radio shows on Joy94.9 and VAR along with a…
data.text:
I'm back (kinda), baby! After 18 months since my assault and 4 months since the resulting back surgery, I'm slowly returning to some magic shows again. Doing a few days onboard the Carnival Splendour A few days in Singapore And then Hamilton Island I'm excited to ease back. The last few weeks getting up on stage, trying something new by doing standup has been a lot of fun. And more exciting news, I'm working on a new TV project, a game show that will see myself and some comedians along with special celebrity guests on back on my previous channels of 31, 34, foxtel aurora plus we will be on Amazon Prime uk and usa!!! Lots happening, so stay tuned #Melbournecomedy #melbournemagician #melbournecomedian #magictrick #magicfestival #melbourne #comedy #comedian #standup #jokes #jokes #magician #magic #illusionist #illusions #outandproud #benmurphy #gaycomedian

What a brilliant night out at the theatre "THE BOY FROM OZ " now showing until July 21 @ The National Theatre, St Kilda Tears, laughter, tears, dance, costumes, tears and loads more laughter. It has it all. And what a cast!!! Here I am chatting to the star Matt Hadgraft, who leads an amazing team of musical theatre stars in this epic production Book now #boyfromoz #theboyfromozmelbourne #theboyrfromozau #PeterAllen #musical #musicals #theatre #dance #dancers #wizardofoz #liza #Judygarland #love #lovestory #comedy #whatsonmelbourne

Wow, what a night reporting for the VIP live premier of TV's Shaynna Blaze's phenomenonal new song "WARRIOR" out everywhere March 3. Shaynna's voice is truly powerhouse crazy good. It blew everyone in the room away. The new track "WARRIOR" is cowritten and made with the gentleman and legend that is the one and only Gary Pinto. It's likely bound to be a top 10 hit. It is beyond good and a perfect, powerful anthem we all need right now. Especially women. Thanks, @angieyoungxposed publicist to the stars for the invite. And photos and pics from my date and uber talented @yuliasprenger #recordingartist #music #musician #band #gig #top10 #single #ep #interview #celebrity #fame #comedy #comedian #magician #magic #recordingartist #music #musician #band #gig #top10 #single #ep #interview #celebrity #fame #comedy #comedian #magician #magic @theblock #interiordesign #interiordesigner #designer #movie #producer #director #single #Warrior #shaynnablaze #songwritter #Melbourne

Did you know, additionally to producing and hosting his own award winning Tv chat show Ben Murphy is also an internationally acclaimed comedy magician and illusionist ? He has done some amazing things - 330 Las Vegas themed shows in the USA - escaped from the infamous Houdini Water Torture Tank over 350 times - performed for Malaysian Royalty - had 5 TV specials in Mongolia - performs in Mandarin and has done well over 500 shows in China is available to book for Gala events, awards nights, end of year events and more. send a message to find out more and be sure to hit like ❤️ #magic #magician #comedy #comedian #illusion #illusionist #lasvegas #fame #celebrity #events #entertainment #CapCut

If you stay ready, you don't have to get ready! Here, the brilliant auso music duo @piercebrothersmusic talk on taking advantage of @jamiroquaihq concert ending and grabbing the exiting audience to engage with their amazing live performance. No doubt, if you have ever attended a festival in Australia, you would already have seen this amazing dynamic duo on stage and know how talented and energetic they are. If not, jump on their socials and get ready to become a fan! @foxtel @aurora.tv @c31melbourne @44_adelaide @widebayitv @facetv Thanks to @onthemappr @alextheatrestk #music #musician #festival #duo #artists #artist #recordingartist #band #singer

Hey everyone! I’m on the lookout for a new role in areas of Producing for tv and radio, radio announcing, Hosting, facilitating live events and guest talks etc I’d love to connect with you all, share my experiences, and catch up on what’s new in your world. If you hear of any exciting opportunities or are open to chatting with a real go getter whose own self produced tv series of 26 episodes won awards , send me a message or comment below! #OpenToWork

Did you know I owe my, now award winning TV series getting started to Gretel Killeen? Crazy right! During lockdown I did a zoom radio interview with her (was so nervous ) and she said that this is what I should be doing. She told me that she was so refreshed to chat with an interviewer that had done their research, was able to go off script and ask questions that were not just pre planned, but made sense and followed on with her comments. She loved how I listened and actually had read the books, watched the clips and spent time looking at her art. So I was thrilled, when she was one of the first guests on the TV show. Here is a super small clip. Be sure to check out her Art. She is exceptionally talented.

Before the Jungle on @imacelebrityau the delightful @stephenkamos braved the hot seat on my TV show. He had 60 seconds to answer as many questions with obmy 2 options to choose as he could- including a sneaky who is nicer @thelastlegofficial host Adam Hills or Good News week and Doug Anthony All Star- Paul McDermott - both Aussie TV legends I adore. I'm cheering on Stephen. An amazing comedian and top bloke. Best of luck! @channel10au #gay #queer #comedian #comedy #imaceleb #imacelebrity #imacelebrityau #laughs #Jungle #Africa #England #jokes #malcolminthemiddle competition #charity #liveattheappollo #gameshow #interview #television
